extendedInfo.description: Itâs a fairy tale world of magic and fantasy. Your little kid must be a fan of bubbles princess and dragons, dwarves and witches, magic and fantasy, Barbie make up, bubbles bath dress up and fun game. Here we are with a magic kingdom of colors. Let your child paint the world of fairy tale characters with his creative and special skills.***How To Play***â Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are done***The Extraordinary And Attractive Gameplay Features***â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬â Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted colorâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this interactive touching coloring book, a nice music plays behind to boost up his  creative thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât feel like erasing it all? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the flashing sketch your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery I play this too! And I am sure your toddler would have fun to color these fairy tale characters. So get it on your device and have fun.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Awful!!
reviews.comment: App can\'t keep up with coloring or changing colors! Then all the sudden dating ads pop up, not good for my toddler to play!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful! Doesn\'t even deserve 1 star!
reviews.comment: It froze a lot while I was trying to color... Lame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never loaded
reviews.comment: After trying too load it several times never opened. Would of been a nifty app too have.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not install
reviews.comment: Phone number now receives spam messages!
reviews.author: Sam Summons
